title: Adults
cleaned_text: In a life threatening emergency dial Triple Zero (000) Mental Health Call Mental Health Triage on [1800 629 354](tel:1800629354) (free call except from mobiles or public phones) or [6205 1065](tel:62051065) Poisons Hotline For a poison emergency in Australia call [13 11 26](tel:131126) Drug and Alcohol Help Line The Drug and Alcohol Help Line is available 24-hours, 7 days a week on [5124 9977](tel:51249977) Health Protection Service For after hours urgent public health matters including environmental health, radiation safety, food poisoning and communicable disease management phone: [02 advice [1800 022 222](tel:1800022222) ACT State Emergency Service Emergency help during flood or storms
